public void testPearsonsCorrelationPValue() throws Exception {
    // this comes from a real world example with many treatments, where the problem is reproducible
    double[][] data = new double[][] {
            { 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222223, 0.022222222222222
